short_description_localized.en: Executive King - 450 sq feet / 42 sqm - Marble Bath - 55 gallon tub - Work area includes large desk – View
short_description_localized.fr: Executive King - 450 sq feet / 42 sqm - Marble Bath - 55 gallon tub - Work area includes large desk – View
short_description_localized.it: Executive King - 450 sq feet / 42 sqm - Marble Bath - 55 gallon tub - Work area includes large desk – View

description_localized.en: Chic Italian style unlike other hotels in Manhattan, our Executive rooms are thoughtfully designed to create a spacious sanctuary for your vacation in New York. There’s a king size bed, comfortable armchairs and an Italian marble bathroom, all complemented by Empire-style cherry wood furniture and elegant furnishings. Executive rooms are located on floor 3 - 7.

images.name: Executive-Room---450sqf---42sqm-
images.alt: This photo showcases our 450 square foot room, featuring one King size bed against the side wall with two night stands on each side. Across from the bed there is an armoire with dresser drawers and a 43 inch flat screen TV. Next to the armoire you will find a fully stocked mini bar, including wine, bottled beverages and assorted snacks available for purchase. Located near the window there is a comfortable armchair with an additional side table next to it.  The room also features a full size work desk, an Italian marble bathroom with a 55 gallon soaking tub and a vanity.
